snippet: One company is closing and the other has a promising future after workers agreed to concessions that many consider to be onerous.
abstract: Two French tire factories owned by Goodyear Dunlop Tires France, face different fates as union at one factory fails to reach labor agreement and other agrees to concessions; situation is emblematic of social and economic crossroads entire country faces.

byline.contributor: Maïa de la Baume contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: One company is closing and the other has a promising future after workers agreed to concessions that many consider to be onerous.

headline.seo: Fates of 2 Factories Show Social Schisms in France
headline.main: 2 Tire Factories With Different Trajectories Reveal Social Schisms in France
headline.print_headline: 2 Tire Factories With Different Trajectories Reveal Social Schisms in France
